title: Be Careful What You Wish for | Shirley Raines
description: Today's guest is Shirley Raines, the Founder of Beauty 2 the Streetz. Shirley started her non-profit organization in 2017. Her mission is to provide makeup, hygiene, and essential services for the homeless of Skid Row, California.
content:encoded: Today's guest is Shirley Raines, the Founder of Beauty 2 the Streetz. Shirley started her non-profit organization in 2017. Her mission is to provide makeup, hygiene, and essential services for the homeless of Skid Row, California.
